rukus.text: Mana Abarumwa olwa boola khubandu ba Luti
(Luti) naboola; “Toto enywe muli Abandu balamanyishe tawe.”
Nibaboola mbu; “mana efwe khukhureerere kalia kabakholelanga obukanakani” nomulembe
“Ne khukhwitsile khubulaamba, netoto efwe khuboolanga obwatoto.”
“Kho rula nende Abandu bawo, ebise bilala mubise bieshilo, nawe abalondekhwo, neyesiyesi mwinywe alakalukhanakhwo okhuhenga inyuma tawe, nemutsie wamulomesibungwa
Nenikhumubusilia likhuwa elo, mbu emisi chiabu chitsa okhutetwa mumabwibwi
Ne Abandu belitokho elo nibetsa nibasangalile
(Lut) Naboola mbu; “Toto bano ni abacheni banje khomulafimbia omurwe tawe”
“Ne murie Nyasaye, ne mulafimbia omurwe tawe”
Naboola mbu: “ bano nabakhana banje itse ebahelesie(mubateshie) toto enywe nimuli abakholanga
Nditsuba khulubaka lulwo, mbu : “abo bali mubumesi bwabu nibanyakhananga eshikhaya.”
Mana nikhukhola hasi wabu okhuba hekulu, mana nikhubakwisilia ifula ya machina yeliloba lwomumulilo.”
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu baretsanga amakhuwa khushichelo
Ne toto tsingongo etso tsili khutsinjila tsiburungwakhwo
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubasuubili
Mana nikhubahelesia eshinyasio, ne ebialo bibili bino bili khunjila ili habulafu
